name: MageDash
description:
Dash around with spells to kill all enemies in your path. Your attack is your only form of movement and vice versa, so aim wisely.

Each floor is randomly generated and populated with 5 different enemies and after you clear every floor you have to swap out one of your 4 equipped spells to a new spell randomly chose from a pool of 10 spells. 

There will be a boss fight on every 5th floor clear all 5 bosses to clear the dungeon.

This game was created for android but there is also a Windows build in case someone needs it.
